<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCFFCC" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=73.533>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=RIGHT>
	2.06 &#150; 2.23
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCFFCC" VALIGN=BOTTOM WIDTH=11.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	%
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-LEFT:8PX; TEXT-INDENT:-8PX">
	Expected lives (years)
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=7.2>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=7.2>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=73.467>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=RIGHT>
	6.25 &#150; 10
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=11.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=7.4>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=8.067>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=73.533>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=RIGHT>
	5.9 &#150; 6.5
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=BOTTOM WIDTH=11.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	The risk-free interest rate is based on U.S. Treasury interest rates at the time of the grant whose term is consistent with the expected life of the stock options. The Company used an average historical stock price volatility based on an analysis of reported data for a peer group of comparable companies that have issued stock options with substantially similar terms, as the Company had limited to no trading history for its common stock. Expected term represents the period that the Company&#146;s stock option grants are expected to be outstanding. The Company elected to utilize the &#147;simplified&#148; method to estimate the expected term. Under this approach, the weighted-average expected life is presumed to be the average of the vesting term and the contractual term of the option.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	Expected dividend yield was considered to be 0% in the option pricing formula since the Company had not paid any dividends and had no plans to do so in the future. The forfeiture rate was considered to be none insofar as the historical experience of the Company is very limited. As required by ASC 718, the Company will adjust the estimated forfeiture rate based upon actual experience.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	The Company recognized $1.6 million and $1.1 million in stock-based compensation expense for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively, for the Company&#146;s stock option awards.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>

	The weighted average grant-date fair value of stock options granted during the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014 was $3.20 and $5.66, respectively.

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	The total fair value of stock options that vested during the year ended December 31, 2015 was approximately $2.9 million.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
	F-20
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<HR STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM:9.6PX; PADDING-TOP:9.6PX" NOSHADE SIZE=1.333>
<A NAME="eolPage111"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS" ALIGN=CENTER>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF">
<B>
	HEAT BIOLOGICS, INC.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS (CONTINUED)
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	At December 31, 2015 and December 31, 2014, the Company evaluated all significant available positive and negative evidence, including the existence of losses in recent years and management&#146;s forecast of future taxable income, and, as a result, determined it was more likely than not that federal and state deferred tax assets, including benefits related to net operating loss carryforwards, would not be realized. &nbsp;The valuation allowance was increased from $9.6 million at December 31, 2014 to $17.6 million at December 31, 2015. &nbsp;The increase in valuation allowance was due primarily to the increase in net operating loss carryforwards.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	At December 31, 2015, the Company has federal net operating loss carryforwards of approximately $42.1 million, which are available to offset future taxable income. &nbsp;The federal net operating loss carryforwards begin to expire in 2029. &nbsp;The Company has various state net operating loss carryforwards totaling approximately $39.2 million, which are available to offset future state taxable income. &nbsp;State net operating losses begin to expire in 2029. &nbsp;The Company has various foreign net operating loss carryforwards of approximately $1.4 million. &nbsp;The foreign net operating loss carryforwards are carried forward indefinitely. &nbsp;Because the Company has incurred cumulative net operating losses since inception, all tax years remain open to examination by U.S. federal, state, and foreign income tax authorities.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	In accordance with FASB ASC 740,
<I>
	Accounting for Income Taxes
</I>
	, the Company reflects in the consolidated financial statements the benefit of positions taken in a previously filed tax return or expected to be taken in a future tax return only when it is considered &#145;more-likely-than-not&#146; that the position taken will be sustained by a taxing authority. As of December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014, the Company had no unrecognized income tax benefits and correspondingly there is no impact on the Company&#146;s effective income tax rate associated with these items. The Company&#146;s policy for recording interest and penalties relating to uncertain income tax positions is to record them as a component of income tax expense in the accompanying statements of operations. As of December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014, the Company had no such accruals.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	The Company files income tax returns in the United States and various state and foreign jurisdictions. The Company is subject to examination by taxing authorities for the tax years ended December&nbsp;31, 2008 through 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; MARGIN-BOTTOM:-2PX; WIDTH:48PX; FLOAT:LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	11.
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:-2PX">
<B>
<I>
	Related Party Transactions
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; CLEAR:LEFT">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	A member of the Company&#146;s management was paid $0 and $28,000 in consulting fees for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	The Company compensates its board members. Board members received between $40,000 and $43,750 and between $32,000 and $37,000 for services rendered during 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	The Company had a related party payable balance of $0 and $26,750 as of December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	The Company had a related party receivable balance of $58,017 and $48,642 as of December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; MARGIN-BOTTOM:-2PX; WIDTH:48PX; FLOAT:LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	12.
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-LEFT:48PX; TEXT-INDENT:-2PX">
<B>
<I>
	Net Loss Per Share
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; CLEAR:LEFT">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	Basic net loss per common share is computed by dividing net loss applicable to common stockholders by the weighted-average number of common shares outstanding during the periods. Fully diluted net loss per common share is computed using the weighted average number of common and dilutive common equivalent shares outstanding during the periods. Common equivalent shares consist of stock options and warrants that are computed using the treasury stock method.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	For the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, all of the Company&#146;s common stock options and warrants are anti-dilutive and therefore have been excluded from the diluted calculation.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
	F-21
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; MARGIN-BOTTOM:-2PX; WIDTH:48PX; FLOAT:LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	13.
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:-2PX">
<B>
<I>
	Commitments and Contingencies
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; CLEAR:LEFT">
<B>
<I>
	&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	On January 24, 2014 the Company entered into a five-year lease for 5,303 square feet of office and laboratory space for monthly rent of $10,341 exclusive of payments required for maintenance of common areas and utilities. On September 30, 2014 the lease was amended to expand the premises by an additional 676 square feet for a total of 5,979 square feet at a monthly rent of $11,638. The Company believes that such facilities are adequate for our current operations, and that there are spaces available sufficient for any future expansion requirements should the need arise. Rent expense was $0.2 million and $0.1 million, for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively. &nbsp;The Company&#146;s approximate future minimum payments for its operating lease obligations that have initial remaining non-cancelable terms in excess of one year are as follows (in thousands):
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 ALIGN=CENTER>

<TD WIDTH=6.733 />
</TR>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_23>

<B>
	EXHIBIT 23.1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=RIGHT>
<BR>
</P>
<EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
<A NAME="FIS_EXPERTS_CONSENT"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; FONT-SIZE:12PT" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	Heat Biologics, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	Durham, North Carolina
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	We hereby consent to the incorporation by reference in the Registration Statements on Form S-3 (No. 333-199274) and Form S-8 (No. 333-193453, No. 333-196763 and No. 333-207108) of Heat Biologics, Inc. of our report dated February 18, 2016, relating to the consolidated financial statements, which appears in this Form 10-K.
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF">
	&nbsp;Our report contains an explanatory paragraph regarding the Company&#146;s ability to continue as a going concern.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	/s/ BDO USA, LLP
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
<BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	Raleigh, North Carolina
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	February 18, 2016
</P>
</EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; MARGIN-BOTTOM:12.2PX">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	&nbsp;
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION">
</A>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION OF PRINCIPAL EXECUTIVE OFFICER
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	PURSUANT TO RULE 13a-14&nbsp;OR RULE 15d-14 OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF 1934,
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION 302 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	I, Jeffrey Wolf, certify that:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>
<TR HEIGHT=0 STYLE="FONT-SIZE:0">
<TD WIDTH=1.2 />
<TD WIDTH=43.133 />
<TD />
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=1.2>

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=43.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	1.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Heat Biologics, Inc.;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>
<TR HEIGHT=0 STYLE="FONT-SIZE:0">
<TD WIDTH=1.2 />
<TD WIDTH=43.133 />
<TD />
</TR>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=43.133>

	2.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>

	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>

<TD />
</TR>

	&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=43.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	4.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I are&nbsp;responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e))&nbsp;and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))&nbsp;for the registrant and have:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>

<TD WIDTH=47.933 />
<TD WIDTH=21.267 />
<TD />
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=47.933>

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>

	a)
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material&nbsp;information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-LEFT:72PX; TEXT-INDENT:-24PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>
<TR HEIGHT=0 STYLE="FONT-SIZE:0">
<TD WIDTH=47.933 />
<TD WIDTH=21.267 />
<TD />
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=47.933>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=21.267>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	b)
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-LEFT:72PX; TEXT-INDENT:-24PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>
<TR HEIGHT=0 STYLE="FONT-SIZE:0">
<TD WIDTH=47.933 />
<TD WIDTH=21.267 />
<TD />
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=47.933>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>

	c)
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-LEFT:72PX; TEXT-INDENT:-24PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>
<TR HEIGHT=0 STYLE="FONT-SIZE:0">
<TD WIDTH=47.933 />
<TD WIDTH=21.267 />
<TD />
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=47.933>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=21.267>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	d)
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>
<TR HEIGHT=0 STYLE="FONT-SIZE:0">
<TD WIDTH=1.2 />
<TD WIDTH=43.133 />
<TD />
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=1.2>

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=43.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	5.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I&nbsp;have&nbsp;disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#146;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>

</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION OF PRINCIPAL FINANCIAL OFFICER
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	PURSUANT TO RULE 13a-14&nbsp;OR RULE 15d-14 OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF 1934,
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION 302 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	I, Timothy Creech, certify that:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TD />
</TR>

</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=43.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	1.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Heat Biologics, Inc.;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">

	2.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TD />
</TR>

</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=43.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	3.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">

</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I are&nbsp;responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e))&nbsp;and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))&nbsp;for the registrant and have:

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	a)
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material&nbsp;information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-LEFT:72PX; TEXT-INDENT:-24PX">

</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=302>

	Title: Chief Financial Officer
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=RIGHT>
<B>
	EXHIBIT 32.1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3">
</A>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION&nbsp;PRINCIPAL EXECUTIVE OFFICER
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350, AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	Pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as created by Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, the undersigned officer of Heat Biologics, Inc. (the &#147;Registrant&#148;) hereby certifies, to such officer&#146;s knowledge, that:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>
<TR HEIGHT=0 STYLE="FONT-SIZE:0">
<TD WIDTH=1.2 />
<TD WIDTH=43.133 />
<TD />
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=1.2>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING:0PX; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=43.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	(1)
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the accompanying Annual Report on Form 10-K of the&nbsp;Registrant for the year ended December 31, 2015 (the &#147;Report&#148;) fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or Section 15(d), as applicable, of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-LEFT:48PX; TEXT-INDENT:-48PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>
<TR HEIGHT=0 STYLE="FONT-SIZE:0">

<TD WIDTH=43.133 />
<TD />
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=1.2>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING:0PX; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=43.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	(2)
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Registrant.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_4"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION&nbsp;PRINCIPAL FINANCIAL OFFICER
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350, AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX" ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX">
	Pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as created by Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, the undersigned officer of Heat Biologics, Inc. (the &#147;Registrant&#148;) hereby certifies, to such officer&#146;s knowledge, that:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:48PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX; FONT-SIZE:10PT" CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=100%>

<TD WIDTH=43.133 />
<TD />
</TR>

<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=1.2>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING:0PX; FONT-SIZE:12PT">
	&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=43.133>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX">
	(1)
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX" VALIGN=TOP>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PX; PADDING-RIGHT:1.067PX" ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the accompanying Annual Report on Form 10-K of the&nbsp;Registrant for the year ended December 31, 2015 (the &#147;Report&#148;) fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or Section 15(d), as applicable, of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
